Sentencas: This paper, it is aimed that nanometer-sized powders can be successfully prepared by using the sol-gel process so that sintering temperatures can be reduced and they can be used as suitable electrolyte candidate materials for medium-temperature SOFC applications.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La, Cu) co-doped CeO2 nanomaterials used as electrolyte material in SOFC applications

Sentencas: Fort his, bare CeO2 (cerium dioxide), which has not yet been encountered in the literature, and La,Cu co-doped CeO2 nanoparticles with different molar ratios (1%, 5%, and 10%) were synthesized as electrolyte material using the sol-gel method for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) applications.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La, Cu) co-doped CeO2 nanomaterials used as electrolyte material in SOFC applications

Sentencas: The synthesized samples were characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDX), UV-Vis spectroscopy, and particle size analysis techniques.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La, Cu) co-doped CeO2 nanomaterials used as electrolyte material in SOFC applications

Sentencas: In order to examine the effect of doping, the structural, morphological, and optical properties of bare cerium oxide and doped cerium oxide powders were compared.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La, Cu) co-doped CeO2 nanomaterials used as electrolyte material in SOFC applications

Sentencas: With the doping process, reductions in average particle sizes were observed, and it was determined that the sample with the lowest average particle size was 5% (La, Cu) co-doped CeO2.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La, Cu) co-doped CeO2 nanomaterials used as electrolyte material in SOFC applications

Sentencas: It has been confirmed by XRD and SEM/EDX that bare CeO2 and co-doped CeO2 powder synthesized have been successfully achieved by the sol-gel technique.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La, Cu) co-doped CeO2 nanomaterials used as electrolyte material in SOFC applications

Sentencas: The results show that the La,Cu co-doped CeO2 sample is promising as an electrolyte material in SOFC applications.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of (La, Cu) co-doped CeO2 nanomaterials used as electrolyte material in SOFC applications
